seo: 用友NC-Cloud,XXE漏洞,数字化平台,大型企业,soapFormat
summary: 检测用友NC-Cloud系统的IUpdateService接口是否存在XXE漏洞，该漏洞可能允许攻击者通过构造恶意XML命令远程控制服务器。
summary_en: Detect XXE vulnerabilities in the IUpdateService interface of Yonyou NC-Cloud. This vulnerability may allow attackers to remotely control the server by constructing malicious XML commands.
